Content.Text: TCU Server has been updated to 1.1.0.0
There's more work to do, but we wanted to get these fixes out ASAP.
▸ Fixed an issue with saves being reset when quitting the game while your game is being saved.
▸ Your game will now be 100% saved on exit.
▸ Fixed new License Plates not showing up in your HQ until you restart the game.
▸ Fixed Summit Practice events giving fake rewards then erroring you out.

Also, everyone - thank you so much for all your support! We greatly appreciate it! 
- whammy4
